etymology.description: 淮海 (Huai River + sea/coast) + 地区 (region) = Huaihai region.
etymology.interpretation: Refers to the area around the Huai River basin and nearby coastal/northern Jiangsu, extending into adjacent parts of Anhui and Shandong. Common in geographic, administrative, and economic contexts (e.g., 淮海经济区).
etymology.simplification: 區 → 区 in PRC character simplification; 淮海 unchanged.

parts.english: Huaihai (region name); Huai River and sea/coast area; area around the Huai River and Yellow Sea coast; Huai–Sea region

examples.chinese: 淮海地区位于淮河流域与江苏北部沿海之间(淮海地區位於淮河流域與江蘇北部沿海之間)。
examples.pinyin: Huáihǎi dìqū wèiyú Huáihé liúyù yǔ Jiāngsū běibù yánhǎi zhījiān.
examples.english: The Huaihai region lies between the Huai River basin and the northern Jiangsu coast.

examples.chinese: 徐州被视为淮海地区的中心城市(徐州被視為淮海地區的中心城市)。
examples.pinyin: Xúzhōu bèi shìwéi Huáihǎi dìqū de zhōngxīn chéngshì.
examples.english: Xuzhou is regarded as the central city of the Huaihai region.

examples.chinese: 这个项目覆盖淮海地区的多个城市(這個項目覆蓋淮海地區的多個城市)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège xiàngmù fùgài Huáihǎi dìqū de duō gè chéngshì.
examples.english: This project covers multiple cities in the Huaihai region.
